method.name: Emit
method.summary: Evaluates the expression and stores the resulting IL in the given context.
method.param: to which the IL should be written.

method.name: ToString
method.returns: The expression as a pseudo-C# string.
method.remarks: This method is used to emit code text when the expression does not support marking its own sequence points ( returns false).

property.name: MarksOwnSequence
property.value: True if the expression marks its own sequence points in the IL stream, false otherwise.
